name: pancho_v1
description: Demo version for the learning protocol pancho, used as master thesis in the Master of Blockchain Technologies at Zigurat

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.dev: npm run dev-client & npm run dev-server
scripts.dev-peer: npm run dev-client & npm run dev-peer --prefix server
scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run server
scripts.start-peer: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run peer

author: Thomas Dekeyser
